showing_n_rows: Showing 100/{{count}} rows, please refine your search.
selected_items_has_been_excludedincluded: Selected items has been excluded/included <b/> in TimeMachine backups.
some_items_failed_to_be_excludedincluded: Some items failed to be excluded/included <b/> in TimeMachine backups.
dont_include_files_into_backups_even_if_: Don't re-include files into backups even if they don't match the rules.
everything_looks_good_no_files_need_to_b: Everything looks good! <b/> No files need to be excluded.
only_if_any_of_these_paths_exists_in_the: ... only if any of these paths exists in the same directory
exclude_paths_that_match_these_patterns: Exclude paths that match these patterns
patterns_must_be_applied_by_at_least_one: Patterns must be applied by at least one directory to take effect.
run_an_initial_full_scan_after_setup: Run an initial full scan after setup.
resync_file_changes_if_incremental_scans: Re-sync file changes if incremental scans fail.
have_been_excluded_from_timemachine_back: have been excluded from TimeMachine backups
have_been_reincluded_into_timemachine_ba: have been re-included into TimeMachine backups
no_files_have_been_excluded_yet: no files have been excluded yet
exclude_include_selected_files_from_time: Exclude/include selected files from TimeMachine backups
support_dump_desc: Add NODUMP flag to excluded files. This flag adds support for DUMP(8) and BorgBackup.
